data.name: League of Felt Tanks
data.detailed_description:
"League of Felt Tanks" is a tank shooter game.
We are developing for multiplayer, but now this single game for store review.
We plan to create Battle with Friends mode and Team Battle mode, CO-OP mode!


Please wait for update!



We plan to add these features.
  • 1~8 players PVP Mode
  • 1~8 players Team PVP Mode
  • 1~3 players CO-OP Mode
  • Unique Bullets like Machinegun, Bomb and Missile.
  • Tank Customization
COMMING SOON!!!!

data.short_description: "League of Felt Tanks" is a tank shooter game. We are developing for multiplayer, but now this single game for store review. We plan to create Battle with Friends mode and Team Battle mode, CO-OP mode! Please wait for update!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) or Windows 10 (64-bit) or Mac OS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 @3.1GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 / Radeon 6870 / Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or Mac OS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 3.3GHz / AMD FX 8350 4.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 4GB VRAM / AMD R9 280 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
